SAINT.LIFE: The legion captain from Constantinople, who was miraculously saved by theLord during a storm on the sea became a monk and led a strict ascetical life on MountLatros in Asia Minor near Miletus. For his extraordinary ascetical efforts he wasbestowed with the gift of wonderworking. He lived in the Eighth or Ninth century.
